mapper.insert: insert into t_info_goods ( goods_id, isbn, goods_name, goods_original_cost, goods_price, goods_inventory, one_classify_id, two_classify_id, goods_advertise, goods_describe, supplier_name, goods_image_path, goods_author, goods_press, goods_views_num, goods_sales, is_delete, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, version ) values ( #{goodsId}, #{isbn}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsOriginalCost}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsInventory}, #{oneClassifyId}, #{twoClassifyId}, #{goodsAdvertise}, #{goodsDescribe}, #{supplierName}, #{goodsImagePath}, #{goodsAuthor}, #{goodsPress}, 0, 0, #{isDelete}, #{createUser}, now(), #{updateUser}, now(), #{version} );
